Text: Hailar District (Mongolian: ᠬᠠᠶᠢᠯᠠᠷ ᠲᠣᠭᠣᠷᠢᠭ "Qayilar toɣoriɣ" Хайлаар тойрог, Cyrillic: Хайлаар дүүрэг, "Khailaar düüreg"; ) is an urban district that serves as the seat of the prefecture-level city Hulunbuir in northeastern Inner Mongolia, China.
Triplets:<Hailar District
